summary: 2000 MONON TRAILER/2007 INTERNATIONAL 9400I. UNIT #1 AND #2 WERE TRAVELING EAST ON IR76 THE OHIO TURNPIKE AT MILEPOST 222.5. UNIT #1 TRAVELING IN THE RIGHT LANE HAD A TIRE BLOWOUT. UNIT #2 TRAVELING IN THE LEFT LANE WAS STRUCK BY TIRE DEBRIS. *LN  THERE WAS DAMAGE TO THE MONON TRAILER AND THE OTHER VEHICLE. (OHIO TRAFFIC CRASH REPORT # 10-0469-91)*JB  AS STARTED ABOVE, ONLY DAMAGE TO TRAILER WAS FLAT TIRE, OTHER VEHICLE HAD SMALL STRACH ON HEADLIGHT. UPDATED 10/06/2011 *LN
